definitions.definition: The state of being free, of not being imprisoned or enslaved.
definitions.example: Having recently been released from prison, he didn't know what to do with his newfound freedom.

definitions.definition: The lack of a specific constraint, or of constraints in general; a state of being free, unconstrained.
definitions.example: Every child has a right to freedom from fear and freedom from want.

definitions.definition: Improper familiarity; violation of the rules of decorum.
